types.html:
n'importe

  1. no matter, never mind the, any, -ever
    n’importe qui ― anyone / anybody; no matter who; whoever
    n’importe quoi ― anything; no matter what; whatever
    n’importe lequel ― any (one); no matter which (one); whichever
    n'importe où ― anywhere; no matter where; wherever
    n'importe comment ― anyhow / anyway; no matter how; however
    n'importe quand ― anytime; no matter when; whenever

Related terms

[edit]
  • importer

Descendants

[edit]
  • Haitian Creole: nenpòt
trans: no matter, never mind the, any, -ever
